name: scrum-poker
description: Self-hosted Scrum Poker for team estimation

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp server.js package.json dist/ && cp public/index.html dist/public/
scripts.build:win: npm run build:clean:win && npm run build:copy:win
scripts.build:clean:win: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist\public
scripts.build:copy:win: copy server.js dist\ && copy package.json dist\ && copy public\index.html dist\public\
